name: makeup
content:
makeup noun [U]
(FOR FACE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 colored substances used on your face to improve or change your appearance: I put on a little eye makeup. She wears a lot of makeup.
More examplesFewer examplesMinor skin imperfections can usually be disguised with a spot of makeup.Who's doing your makeup for the wedding?With his makeup and strange clothes, he looked like nothing on earth.She fritters so much money away on expensive makeup.Ten-year-olds have started wearing lipstick and makeup in imitation of the older girls.Don't cry, or your makeup will run.

makeup noun [U]
(PARTS)
The makeup of something or someone is the combination of things that form it: They argue that the membership of the Council does not reflect the racial makeup of the city. Organizational ability is not one of the most obvious parts of his makeup.

(COMBINATION)
[ C usually sing ] a combination of things that form something: The committee’s membership does not reflect the city’s racial makeup.
